did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: William Parmer Fuller Papers,

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 3 manuscript boxes, 2 oversize boxes, 3 album boxes, 5 envelopes, 1 phonotape reel

did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, memoranda, clippings, telegrams, photographs, and memorabilia, relating to American Relief Administration work in Poland at the end of World War I, and to Herbert Hoover. Includes correspondence with Herbert and Lou Henry Hoover.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], William Parmer Fuller Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

controlaccess.head: Access Points
controlaccess.corpname: American Relief Administration. European Children's Fund.
controlaccess.subject: International relief.
World War, 1914-1918.
World War, 1914-1918--Civilian relief.

did.unittitle: Correspondence and telegrams exchanged between Herbert and Lou Henry Hoover and Adaline and W. Parmer Fuller, 1920-1962
W. P. Fuller's diary pertaining to his activities in the Mission to Poland of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund, 1919-1921
Correspondence, reports, memoranda, telegrams, etc., pertaining to W. P. Fuller's activities in the Mission to Poland of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund, 1919
Correspondence, reports, memoranda, telegrams, etc., pertaining to W. P. Fuller's activities in the Mission to Poland of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund, 1920
Correspondence, reports, memoranda, telegrams, etc., pertaining to W. P. Fuller's activities in the Mission to Poland of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund, 1920-1921
Correspondence, reports, memoranda, telegrams, etc., pertaining to W. P. Fuller's activities in the Mission to Poland of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund, 1920-1922
Miscellaneous correspondence
United States. Department of State. Correspondence, reports, memoranda, etc., regarding property rights of United States citizens in Mexico, 1927
Case histories of Polish families aided by the Mission to Poland of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund
Maps of Polish-speaking and surrounding areas during World War I
Miscellaneous reports, clippings, personal notes, and memorabilia.
Notes on Trip with Hoover Mission, March-June, 1946
Medals. Includes Hoover medal from Argentina, 1928 December 13; Edith Cavell medal, 1915; Medal commemorating the "Bataille de la Marne," dated September 1914
Miscellany
American Relief Administration European Children's fund estimated cost of operations book, 1920
One album of watercolor hand-painted thank-yous to W. P. Fuller and Polish posters
One flattened scroll containing a handwritten thank-you to W. P. Fuller
Albums and Photographs

2 prints of Mrs. W. Parmer Fuller and others; 1 print of Mr. and Mrs. W. Parmer Fuller and others; 1 print of Herbert C. Hoover and others of the Supreme Economic Counsel, Paris Peace Conference, Paris, 1919; 11 prints of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund activities in Poland, 1919-1920.
83 prints of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund activities in Poland and Czechoslovakia,
44 prints of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund activities in Poland.
91 prints of the American Relief Administration European Children's Fund activities in Poland.

1 print of W. Parmer Fuller; 61 prints of American Relief Administration European Children's Fund activities in Romania; 8 prints of American Relief Administration European Children's Fund activities in Poland; 41 prints of Queen Marie of Romania and others; 34 postcards of European scenes.
36 oversize pages of mounted photographs of scenes in Poland.
1 photograph album of schools, orphanages, and scenes in Poland.
1 photograph album of schools, orphanages, and scenes in Poland.
1 photograph album of Lithuanian schools, orphanages, and scenes.
1 photograph album of American Relief Administration European Children's Fund personnel and activities in Poland.
1 photograph album of American Relief Administration European Children's Fund personnel and activities in Poland.
1 photograph album of American Relief Administration European Children's Fund personnel and activities in Poland.
174 negatives
